General.Name: ADS Maritime Holding Plc
General.Description: ADS Maritime Holding Plc operates as a shipping investment company. It holds investments in vessels comprising shuttle tankers and MR tankers. The company was formerly known as ADS Crude Carriers Plc and changed its name to ADS Maritime Holding Plc in December 2020. ADS Maritime Holding Plc was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Limassol, Cyprus.
